original_text: But the Lord was angry with me because of you and would not listen to me. And the Lord said to me, ‘Enough from you; do not speak to me of this matter again.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너희 때문에 내게 진노하사 내 말을 듣지 아니하시고 내게 이르시기를 그만해도 족하니 이 일로 다시 내게 말하지 말라

sentences.original_text: But the Lord was angry with me because of you
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 주님은 너희 때문에 내게 화가 나셨다

sentences.original_text: and would not listen to me.
And the Lord said to me,
do not speak to me of this matter again.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 일로 다시는 내게 말하지 말라
